T02D1990:186a-1: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1990:186a-3: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1990:186a-4: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1990:186a-5: gang zhig sgrub pa pos gdug pa can rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gzhug pa'i phyir /
T02D1990:186a-6: skal ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos dben pa'i gnas su song ste /
T02D1990:186a-8: mchod pa dang gtor ma sngon du song bas /
T02D1990:186a-9: rdo rje phag mo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1990:186a-10: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma sku mdog dmar mo /
T02D1990:186a-11: phyag g-yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1990:186a-12: de'i steng du g-yas gri gug 'jog pa /
T02D1990:186a-13: padma dang zla ba'i steng du g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1990:186a-14: g-yas bskum pas de'i byin pa'i steng du reg pa'i brkyang bskum gyis bzhugs pa /
T02D1990:186a-16: dbu skra grol ba cung zad khro ba'i rnam pa can /
T02D1990:186a-17: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1990:186a-18: gar gyi ro dang ldan pa bsgom mo //
T02D1990:186a-19: de'i snying ga'i chu skyes las zla ba'i steng du hr'i: dmar po blta'o //
T02D1990:186a-20: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa kha phye ba la /
T02D1990:186a-21: a'a li bcu drug 'dab ma re re la gnyis gnyis mdun nas brtsams te /
T02D1990:186a-22: g-yas skor du mgo gyen du bstan pa mdog dmar po bsams la /
T02D1990:186a-23: ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1990:186a-24: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1990:186a-33: zhes 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sems kyis bzlas so //
T02D1990:186a-35: rang gi snying ga'i h'um hr'i: las 'od zer 'phros
T02D1990:186a-36: te song bas bsgrub bya'i snying la phog / bdag
T02D1990:186a-37: la ma dad pa'i dri ma phyir bsal te /
T02D1990:186a-38: gus pa'i sems gsal bar skyes par bsam /
T02D1990:186b-0: de nas bsgrub bya de'i snying @186b gar sngags kyi dbyangs kyi yi ge bsams la /
T02D1990:186b-1: bdag gi snying gnas sna bug g-yas nas hr'i: thon te /
T02D1990:186b-2: sna bug g-yon nas zhugs te /
T02D1990:186b-3: snying ga'i dbyangs yig dang rang gi snying ga'i yig
T02D1990:186b-4: 'bru la bsil la bde ba bsam kho'i snying ga'i
T02D1990:186b-6: ming yig dang po skom dungs dungs par bsam mo //
T02D1990:186b-7: hr'i: la thim pas skom pa'i gdung bsel ba dang /
T02D1990:186b-8: bde ba skyes pa de gzhibs nas /
T02D1990:186b-9: yang snying gar bsdus pa la 'og gi tshigs bcad kyi don dran par bya'o //
T02D1990:186b-10: de ltar zhag bdun gyi mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
T02D1990:186b-12: yang rang kha nub tu bstan pa'i mdun du me long la dris byugs te /
T02D1990:186b-14: de la padma 'dab ma bzhi pa lte ba dang bcas pa bris te /
T02D1990:186b-15: lte bar hr'i: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang
T02D1990:186b-16: du yam ram bam lam rim pa bzhin bkod pa
T02D1990:186b-17: dang / ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1990:186b-18: nam mkha' la yi ge lnga bris pa lta bu ste /
T02D1990:186b-19: nag po dang dmar po dang /
T02D1990:186b-21: ser po'i rnam par bsams la /
T02D1990:186b-22: me long gi yi ge rnams la bstim /
T02D1990:186b-23: yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa lnga la sngags de nyid brjod cing /
T02D1990:186b-26: de nas phreng ba dmar po bzung ste /
T02D1990:186b-27: yam ram bam lam hr'i: zhes bzlas so ;
T02D1990:186b-28: / lte ba'i yi ge las 'od kyi phreng ba spros te /
T02D1990:186b-29: mdun gyi sngags la thim pa la sogs pa spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa bya'o //
T02D1990:186b-30: de ltar sa ya phrag gnyis bzlas so //
T02D1990:186b-31: de nas nya'i nub mo mtshan thog thag bya'o //
T02D1990:186b-32: de ni bsnyen pa bya ba'o //
T02D1990:186b-33: de nas rang byung gi me tog sindhu ra dang bcas pa'i mandala sngar bzhin bkram ste /
T02D1990:186b-34: shar la sogs pa'i yig 'bru yam la sogs pa bkod la /
T02D1990:186b-35: snga ma ltar yi ge la bstim /
T02D1990:186b-36: mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing /
T02D1990:186b-38: chu skyes kyi hr'i: las 'od 'phros te bsgrub bya mdun du bkug ste /
T02D1990:186b-40: yang hr'i:'i 'od zer dmar po'i snying gar thim pas /
T02D1990:186b-41: dmar khrig ste khengs nas myos te /
T02D1990:186b-42: bdag la chags pas brgyal bar bsams la /
T02D1990:186b-44: yi ge sngags rnams rnam par yangs //
T02D1990:186b-45: sgra dang thig le sems kyang med //
T02D1990:186b-46: 'di ni bde ba chen po'i mchog / bdag dang gzhan du yod ma yin //
T02D1990:187a-2: de ltar zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1990:187a-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs grub thob kyi 'khor
T02D1990:187a-4: los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa
T02D1990:187a-6: / rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po rgyal ba'i sras bi bh'u ti tsandra'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1990:187a-7: dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi gtsug lag khang rang byung
T02D1990:187a-8: du mdzad pa las glo bo lo ts'a ba dge
